newsitem.title: USA: Central Power & Light debt restrictions lifted.
newsitem.headline: Central Power & Light debt restrictions lifted.

text.p: Central and South West Corp said Thursday shareholders of Central Power and Light Co voted to eliminate restrictions on the amount of unsecurred debt the utility issues.

At the special meeting Monday, shareholders who own more than 70 percent of the utility's outstanding preferred shares voted in favor of the amendment to the company's articles of incorporation, Central and South West said, noting this is more than the two-thirds majority of outstanding shares needed for approval.
All of Central Power's outstanding common is owned by Central and South West, which voted in favor of the amendment.
